issue.summary: A possible genome sequencing error in AP000347.1 affects a splice site of LOC91316
issue.description: A possible genome sequencing error in AP000347.1 creates a non-canonical splice site within LOC91316
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KC877945.1 has been added to the GRCh38 reference assembly patching component AP000347.1 and improving the alignment of LOC91316 to the reference.

issue.summary: Assignment of CT978678 from PMID: 18477386 to chr. Un for GRCh37
issue.description: CT978678 has been placed on Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.
issue.resolution_text: The component CT978678.7 has been placed on the chromosome 22 TPF as a short arm sequence based on historical localisation information, PMID: 18477386.

issue.description: CT867976 has been placed on Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.

issue.summary: Assignment of CT954328 from PMID: 18477386 to chr. Un for GRCh37
issue.description: CT954328 has been placed on Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.
issue.resolution_text: Component CT954328.2 (SC22cB-73C9) is from a flow sorted chromosome 22 cosmid library. The component has been admixture mapped to chr22p but is redundant under component AC137488.2 (HG-1680) and will not be retained in the reference assembly.

issue.summary: multiple indels in last coding exon of SCARF2 shift reading frame across about 21aa
issue.status_text: Currently determining how best to represent variation in the reference.
issue.description: Three single base deletions in the reference genome cause the reading frame of part of the last exon of SCARF2 to shift across a stretch of around 21aa. Only a single cDNA is in agreement with genome.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Deletion in genome in coding exon of SHANK3
issue.description: Around 42 bp of SHANK3 cDNA AB569469.1 do not match the genome. Missing GC-rich sequence is from a CpG island that contains exon 12 of CCDS46737.
issue.resolution_text: Components AC255361.1 and FO681507.3 have been added to the reference assembly providing correct representation for the SHANK3 gene.

issue.summary: GeneID: 414918 (FAM116B), assembly gap
issue.description: A gap in the Build 36 reference assembly between components CR759740.1and BX545851.6 may contain portions of FAM116B (GeneID:414918, NM_001001794.1).
issue.resolution_text: Finished components CT009622.1, CU041238.2 and CU074331.2 have been inserted in to the TPF to close the gap between components CR759740.1and BX545851.6

issue.summary: GeneID: 758 (MPPED1), assembly gap
issue.description: Alignment of NM_001044370.1 spans contigs NT_011520.11,NT_011521.4
issue.resolution_text: Finished component CU137653.1inserted in to the TPF to close the gap between components BX890592.4 and CR377231.3

issue.summary: Deletion occuring in D87011.1
issue.description: Optical map and end sequence analysis indicate a deletion of ~12kbp is occuring in D87011.1
issue.resolution_text: Finished component AC246793.1 contains the missing sequence and has been added to the reference TPF, replacing D87011.1. The component AC246793.1 is part of a CHORI-17 pathway that has replaced components D86995-AP000362 in the reference assembly (HG-1334).

issue.summary: Reference assembly representation of CYP2D6 is not the clinical standard
issue.description: The GRCh37 representation of CYP2D6 differs from the clinical standard for this gene.
issue.resolution_text: Finished component AC254562.1 has been placed in to the reference assembly in place of BX247885.11. This new sequence represents the clinical standard CYP2D6 gene. The CYP2D6 allele represented by component BX247885.11 will be retained as an ALT LOCI.

issue.summary: Chr22 gap problem
issue.status_text: 19-JUN-13: CH17-265E22 has completed sequence production and a draft assembly has been submitted
issue.description: There is a gap between the centromere and component AP000542.1
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr22 gap problem
issue.status_text: 17-DEC-14: CH17-338E24 has entered the sequencing pipeline
issue.description: There is a gap in the chromosome between components AP000522.1 and AP000543.1
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: FIX patch for Chr22 gap problem
issue.description: There is a gap between the centromere and component AP000542.1 originally described in HG-1484. This duplicate Jira issue is being used to manage an update at this gap that is being considered for patch release.
issue.resolution_text: There is a gap between the centromere and component AP000542.1 originally described in HG-1484. This duplicate Jira issue is being used to manage an update at this gap that is being considered for patch release.

issue.summary: FIX patch for Chr22 gap problem (left side)
issue.description: There is a gap in the chromosome between components AP000522.1 and AP000543.1. This is a duplicate issue used for patch release of an extension from the left side into the gap.
issue.resolution_text: There is a gap in the chromosome between components AP000522.1 and AP000543.1. This is a duplicate issue used for patch release of an extension from the left side into the gap.

issue.summary: FIX patch for Chr22 gap problem (right side)
issue.description: There is a gap in the chromosome between components AP000522.1 and AP000543.1. This is a duplicate issue used for patch release of an extension from the right side into the gap.
issue.resolution_text: There is a gap in the chromosome between components AP000522.1 and AP000543.1. This is a duplicate issue used for patch release of an extension from the right side into the gap.

issue.summary: Chr 22 ABC12 pathway
issue.status_text: 17-DEC-14: ABC12-46736700I13 has entered the sequencing pipeline 20-JUN-13: ABC12-49080100H18 is in active finishing 18-JUN-13: ABC12-47020000M7 is in active finishing 16-AUG-13: ABC12-46660900L7 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 23-MAY-14: ABC12-46900900H23 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 30-JUL-14: ABC12-49200300I1 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 23-JUL-13: ABC12-49169300H21 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 06-SEP-14: ABC12-49080700F16 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 19-JUN-13: ABC12-49026800P7 is in active finishing 19-JUN-13: ABC12-49057500M11 is in active finishing 10-JUN-13: ABC12-7904349E3 has been cancelled 20-JUN-13: ABC12-49081500K13 is in active finishing 10-JUN-13: ABC12-49287700N20 is in active finishing 19-JUN-13: ABC12-49070300A13 is in active finishing Accession for ABC12-49080700F16: FO681511 Accession for ABC12-49169300H21: FO681509 Accession for ABC12-49200300I1: FO681510 Accession for ABC12-49287700N20: FO681507 Accession for ABC12-46660900L7: FO681517 Accession for ABC12-46900900H23: FO681526 Accession for ABC12-47020000M7: FO681529 Accession for ABC12-49026800P7: FO681530 Accession for ABC12-49057500M11: FO681527 Accession for ABC12-49070300A13: FO681528 Accession for ABC12-49080100H18: FO681532 Accession for ABC12-49081500K13: FO681531
issue.description: Several clones have been selected for sequencing to replace the reference components BX545851.6-AC002055.2 and represent the region in a single haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible duplication allele at CYP2D6 locus: AC195743.1
issue.description: AC195743.1 (WI2-2935J15) possibly represents an insertion allele at CYP2D6
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible duplication allele at CYP2D6 locus: AC225828.2
issue.description: AC225828.2 (ABC11-4942200E12) possibly represents an insertion allele at CYP2D6.
issue.resolution_text: This pathway has been uploaded to the Chr. 22 ALT_REF_LOCI_7 TPF.

issue.summary: Possible duplication allele at CYP2D6 locus: AC236040.3
issue.description: AC236040.3 (ABC8-740722A11) contains a possible duplication of the CYP2D6 gene and is being considered for inclusion as a GRCh37 NOVEL patch.
issue.resolution_text: AC236040.3 is a finished component it represents a sequence insertion of 12.1kb relative to the reference assembly and contains a duplication of CYP2D6 (NM_001025161.2). The component has been added to the ALT_REF_LOCI_2 TPF.

issue.summary: Chr. 22 missing copy of segmental duplication found on chr. 2
issue.description: GRCh37 chr. 22 is missing a segmental duplication of sequence found on chr. 2.
issue.resolution_text: HuRef scaffold NW_001840933.1, comprising the single contig ABBA01016769.1 fully represents a ~40kbp segmental duplication of sequence from 2p22.2 currently missing from chromosome 22. The contig has been localized with high confidence through admixture mapping to the pericentromeric region of chromosome 22 and has been added to the Chr22 TPF.

issue.summary: GeneID: 100128946 (LOC100128946), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: GRCh37 represents a minor allele at coordinates NC_000022.10:49288477, this results in a rare GT-AA non-canonical splice junction in the reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig KF459615.1 has been generated and uploaded to the Chr.22 TPF, fixing this base for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Former 1q21 pericentromeric sequence FP325308.11 needs to be localized
issue.description: Former 1q21 pericentromeric sequence FP325308.11 needs to be localized
issue.resolution_text: The component FP325308.11 has been placed on the chromosome 22 TPF as a short arm sequence based on admixture mapping localisation information.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Admixture mapping of decoy sequence
issue.description: The component RP11-1277N13/AC138776.2 is 202,926bp long and 100,990bp of its sequence make part of the decoy sequences. It is currently unlocalized, but it admixture maps unambiguously to chr22p (6 SNPs with LOD>=6, largest LOD 7.83).
issue.resolution_text: The component AC138776.2 has been placed on the chromosome 22 TPF as a short arm sequence based on admixture mapping localisation information.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Admixture mapping of decoy sequence
issue.description: The component RP11-39N6/AC092854.14 is 163,955bp long and 163,819bp of its sequence make part of the decoy sequences. Admixture mapping confirms the localization to chr22q11.
issue.resolution_text: AC092854.14 has been added to the Chr22 reference TPF placing in the gap associated with Jira ticket HG-1485.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Admixture mapping of decoy sequence
issue.description: The component RP11-30B7 AC093749.3 is 163,102bp long and 160,389bp of its sequence make part of the decoy sequences. It is localized to chromosome 4, but through admixture mapping it localizes to chromosome 22 (4 SNPs, max LOD score 6.58).
issue.resolution_text: The component AC093749 has been placed on the chromosome 22 TPF as a short arm sequence based on admixture mapping localisation information.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Admixture mapping of decoy sequence
issue.description: The component RP11-98L17/AC116618.4 is 153,040bp long and 148,815bp of its sequence make part of the decoy sequences. It is localized to chromosome 4, but through admixture mapping it localizes to chromosome 22p (3 SNPs, max LOD score 7.32).
issue.resolution_text: The component AC116618.4 has been placed on the chromosome 22 TPF as a short arm sequence based on admixture mapping localisation information.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Admixture mapping of decoy component
issue.description: The component RP11-1278L23/AC145543.3 is 221,027bp long and 185,973bp of its sequence make part of the decoy sequences. It is currently unlocalized, but it admixture maps to chr22 (2 SNPs with max LOD score 9.08).
issue.resolution_text: AC145543.3 has been added to the Chr22 reference TPF placing in the gap associated with Jira ticket HG-1485.

issue.summary: Clone containing sequence present in the decoy needs to be added to the reference.
issue.description: The component AC137488.2 (CTD-2506I5) is 167,135bp long of which 121,805bp is part of the decoy sequences. It is localized to chr16 but through admixture mapping it has been localizes to chr22p (11 SNP's max LOD score 7.31).
issue.resolution_text: The component AC137488.2 has been placed on the chromosome 22 TPF as a short arm sequence based on admixture mapping localisation information.

issue.summary: Chr.22 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the chromosome between components AC024070.2 and AC007731.16.
issue.resolution_text: Components AC024070.2 and AC007731.16 overlap closing the gap in the reference assembly.

issue.summary: GeneID: 25817 (FAM19A5), assembly gap
issue.description: The two BACs listed border the gap that is spanned by the FAM19A5 RefSeqs NM_015381.5 and NM_001082967.1. The 5'-most exon of each variant align to BACs AL096853.13 and Z84468.1 and exon 2 aligns to AL096843.11 on the other side of the gap. The mRNA is completely represented on Celera contig NW_927650.1 but this region has gaps, as well.
issue.resolution_text: The Build 36 gap between CR391954.2 and CR450365.3 has been closed in GRCh37 by an update of the latter sequence to CR450365.4

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC009286.32 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC009286.32 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.status_text: Historical and Admixture mapping information has localized these components to the short arm of chromosome 22, however the order and orientation of the components is unknown.
issue.description: The order and orientation of components localized to the chromosome 22 short arm is unknown.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 335 (APOA1), may be redundant
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113960 (component: AC087065.4), which was localized to chr. 22, has an alignment to sequence found on reference chr. 11
issue.resolution_text: AC087065 is a chimeric clone and has been removed from the assembly.

issue.summary: No representation for GeneID: 2952 (GSTT1) in primary assembly unit
issue.description: In progress
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC007731.16
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines and overlapping components AC005500.2 and AC004033.3 indicate that the indel is sequence variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268481.1 and GU269021.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 22, suggest there may be ~4,325 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC007731.16. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL035659.22
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines indicate that the indel is sequence variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267391.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 22, suggest there may be ~3,501 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL035659.22. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL078622.7
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines does not support the GRCh38 assembly and are consistent with an insertion of 7.3kb sequence.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268786.1 and GU267612.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 22, suggest there may be ~8,262 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL078622.7. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within Z82189.1
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines and overlapping component Z82202.1 indicate that the indel is sequence variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268524.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 22, suggest there may be ~856 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component Z82189.1. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: A single-haplotype ABC14 fosmid pathway has been sequenced in an effort to represent the CYP2D6 region.

issue.summary: A single-haplotype ABC7 fosmid pathway has been sequenced in an effort to represent a deletion allele in the CYP2D6 region.
issue.description: A single-haplotype ABC7 fosmid pathway has been sequenced in an effort to represent a deletion allele in the CYP2D6 region.
issue.resolution_text: The ABC7 fosmid pathway has been sequenced and the TPF containing the deletion allele has been uploaded to the Chr. 22 ALT_REF_LOCI_4 TPF.

issue.summary: A single-haplotype ABC7 fosmid has been sequenced in an effort to represent the non-deletion allele of CYP2D6.
issue.description: AC254640.1/ABC7-42060100J1 has been sequenced in an effort to represent 1 of 2 ABC7 haplotypes of CYP2D6.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: An ABC12 fosmid (AC254565.1/ABC12-49046000E12) is being sequenced in an effort to represent 1 of 2 CYP2D6 haplotypes.
issue.description: An ABC12 fosmid pathway is being sequenced in an effort to represent 1 of 2 CYP2D6 haplotypes.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: A single-haplotype ABC12 fosmid pathway has been sequenced in an effort to represent 1 of 2 CYP2D6 haplotypes.
issue.description: A single-haplotype ABC12 fosmid pathway has been sequenced in an effort to represent CYP2D6
issue.resolution_text: This ABC12 fosmid pathway has been uploaded to the Chr. 22 ALT_REF_LOCI_8 TPF for GRCh38.p6 release.

issue.summary: An ABC11 fosmid pathway is being sequenced in an effort to represent 1 of 2 CYP2D6 haplotypes.
issue.description: An ABC11 fosmid pathway is being sequenced in an effort to represent 1 of 2 CYP2D6 haplotypes.
issue.resolution_text: This ABC11 pathway has been uploaded to the Chr. 22 ALT_REF_LOCI_6 TPF.

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.description: Ambiguous IUPAC base (R) in NC_000022.11: 16309656 in component AEKP01214349.1.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.description: Ambiguous IUPAC bases in NC_000022.11: 16326810 (R), 16320469 (W), 16325090 (Y), and 16327066 (Y) in component AEKP01214351.1.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Assembly component AL117329.9 has had an accession.version update
issue.description: Assembly component AL117329.9 has had an accession.version update. GRC curator review needed to ensure proper representation in future assembly versions.
issue.resolution_text: The update of assembly component AL117329.9 is described in HG-1954, no further curation is required here

issue.summary: GeneID: 8214 (DGCR6), may be redundant
issue.description: LOC102724770 may be redundant with DGCR6 (GeneID: 8214).
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 8218 (CLTCL1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_007098.2 (CLTCL1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Component AC000072.2 has been added to the reference assembly. This corrects a 1nt deletion occurring in the reference component L77569.1 that causes disruption to RefSeq NM_007098.2 (CLTCL1).

issue.summary: GeneID: 10634 (GAS2L1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_152236.1 (GAS2L1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459717.1 has been added to the GRCh38 reference assembly patching component AC002059.3 and improving the alignment of GAS2L1 to the reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 23542 (MAPK8IP2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_012324.3 (MAPK8IP2) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF573648.1 has been added to the GRCh38 reference assembly patching component U62317.2 and improving the alignment of MAPK8IP2 to the reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 80832 (APOL4), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_030643.3 (APOL4) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459718.1 has been added to the GRCh38 reference assembly patching component Z95114.19 and improving the alignment of APOL4 to the reference.

issue.summary: Poor/no alignment for CT025559.1 and AL080240.7
issue.description: Poor/ no alignment between CT025559.1 and AL080240.7
issue.resolution_text: AL080240.7 removed from TPF.

issue.summary: Lack of alignment/certificate for AL021393.1 and Z95116.1 precludes contig building
issue.description: Lack of alignment/certificate for AL021393.1 and Z95116.1 precludes contig building
issue.resolution_text: Certificate submitted for short join.

issue.summary: Chr.22 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AP000542.1 and AP000543.1.
issue.resolution_text: The TPF has been altered with respect to the optical map information reversing the orientation of contig NT_028395.3 such that components AP000522.1 and AP000543.1 are paired across a gap, with AP000542.1 proximal to the centromere.

issue.summary: Chr.22 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AC023490.5 and AC011718.2.
issue.resolution_text: The TPF has been altered with respect to the optical mapping information. Components AC024070.2 and AC007731.16 are paired across a gap and components AC023490.5 and AC011718.2 are located in the gap corresponding to Jira issue HG-981. A new issue will be raised to deal with the gap between components AC024070.2 and AC007731.16

issue.summary: Chr.22 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components BX890592.2 and CR377231.2.
issue.resolution_text: Finished component CU137653.1inserted in to the TPF to close the gap between components BX890592.4 and CR377231.3

issue.summary: Chr.22 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components CR936488.1 and CR954960.1.
issue.resolution_text: Gap closed by components CU210860 and CT009695.

issue.summary: Chr.22 Gap Problem
issue.status_text: 03-JAN-14: ABC13-48050100J20 has entered the sequencing pipeline Accession for ABC13-48050100J20: FO704912
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components CR536608.3 and AL022327.17.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr.22 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components CR790389.1 and CR932344.3.
issue.resolution_text: Finished component CT010163.2 inserted in to the TPF to close the gap between components CR790389.2 and CR932344.3

issue.summary: Chr.22 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly in component AC002055.2 and the telomere
issue.resolution_text: Finished component AC213861.3 (WI2-1161P17) has been added to the TPF. The component extends off AC002055.2 and sequences into the telomere.

issue.summary: Possible path problem for AP000351.3 and AP000352.2
issue.description: AP000351.3 and AP000352.2 align to one another in opposing orientations, creating a problem for contig building.
issue.resolution_text: AP000351.3 contains a 50kb insertion variation relative to AP000352.2 Finished component AC253536.3 has been added to the reference TPF replacing both components and representing the deletion haplotype present in AP000352.2. The insertion haplotype found in AP000351.3 has been added to the ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF.

issue.summary: CT008506.2 can be removed from TPF
issue.description: CT008506.2 sequence is redundant to that present in CR956437.2 and CR933557.2
issue.resolution_text: CT008506.2 removed from TPF. Certificate submitted for short join between CR956437.2 and CR933557.2.

issue.summary: Chr.22 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly in component between the centromere and AP000522.1
issue.resolution_text: The TPF has been altered with respect to the optical map information reversing the orientation of contig NT_028395.3 such that components AP000522.1 and AP000543.1 are paired across a gap, with AP000542.1 proximal to the centromere.

issue.summary: Chr.22 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly in component AP000522.1
issue.resolution_text: Same issue as HG-623

issue.summary: Chr.22 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly in component AP000522.1
issue.resolution_text: Same issue as HG-623

issue.summary: BX546448 added to chr. Un
issue.description: Assignment of unplaced BX546448 to the reference genome is questionable
issue.resolution_text: BX546448.4 has been localized to chromosome 22 centromeric region through admixture mapping. The component has been placed on the chromosome 22 UNLOCALIZED TPF.

issue.summary: CYP2D6 deletion allele/C22_H2
issue.description: Trimming of AL021878 in update from version 2 to version3 removes representation of a deletion haplotype for CYP2D6 (GeneID: 1565)
issue.resolution_text: AL021878.3 has been updated to AL021878.4, restoring representation of the CYP2D6 deletion allele. The deletion allele is represented in GRCh37 NOVEL PATCH GL383582.1, and will become an alt loci when GRCh38 is released. A GRCh37 anchor Z82192 has been added to the NOVEL patch.

issue.summary: Split finish clone RP5-1061O18 to be removed from the TPF
issue.description: Split finish clone RP5-1061O18 to be replaced in the TPF
issue.resolution_text: RP5-1061O18 has been resubmitted and the accession FP340309.1 added to the TPF replacing the split finished component AL049773.1. Sequenced component FQ976903.8 has been added to the reference replacing the split finish component AL049774.1

issue.description: Split finish clone RP1-213J1 to be replaced in the TPF

issue.summary: GeneID: 27443 (CECR2), assembly gap, chromosome
issue.status_text: 29-NOV-13: CH17-49H5 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 Accession for CH17-49H5: FO681548
issue.description: The first exon of NM_031413.2 (CERC2) do not appear to align to GRCh37, suggesting a possible deletion in assembly component AC005399.21or AC004019.20.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 26150 (RIBC2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: reference genome lacks a 'C' that occurs at nt 401 of NM_015653.3. This affects component AL0213912.2
issue.resolution_text: Sequence has been corrected, new accession is AL021391.3

issue.summary: Chr.22 assembly gap
issue.status_text: CH17-409N24 has been selected for sequencing extending in to the gap. 23-MAY-13: CH17-409N24 has entered the sequencing pipeline
issue.description: An assembly gap has been inserted into the TPF between AC008079/AC008132 as OM data suggests that there is data missing (~400kb) between these 2 accessions
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: APOBEC gene deletion polymorphism
issue.description: APOBEC gene deletion polymorphism is not represented in reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: The APOBEC deletion polymorphism (APOBEC3A_B, Gene ID: 100913187, PMID: 17447845) has been released as a NOVEL patch for GRCh37 (GL383583.1/NW_003315972.1) and is an ALT locus in GRCh38.
